sys_security_acl.description: Prevent User from being updated if the status is Running

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_security_acl"><sys_security_acl action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>false</active><admin_overrides>false</admin_overrides><advanced>true</advanced><condition/><description>Prevent User from being updated if the status is Running</description><name>x_tekso_twxapp01_setup.ucontrol_integration_user</name><operation display_value="write">write</operation><script><![CDATA[// Only allow update if the status is not Running
if (gs.hasRole('x_tekso_twxapp01.admin') && current.getValue('status') !='Running') {
	answer = true;
}

answer;
]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_security_acl</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>robin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-01-29 10:38:52</sys_created_on><sys_id>efaff9cfdba2485035a38a7239961994</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>x_tekso_twxapp01_setup.ucontrol_integration_user</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Application 1" source="x_tekso_twxapp01">993be4b2db62085035a38a72399619a7</sys_package><sys_policy>protected</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="Application 1">993be4b2db62085035a38a72399619a7</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_security_acl_efaff9cfdba2485035a38a7239961994</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>robin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-02-01 22:08:11</sys_updated_on><type display_value="record">record</type></sys_security_acl></record_update>
